job.title: Machine Learning Engineer
job.description:
Zillow Offers is an initiative at the core of Zillow’s evolution, focused on defining the future of real estate. Our business seeks to make it simple to buy and sell homes by giving consumers certainty and control and sparing them the tremendous stress of the traditional process!
We are a collaborative, passionate team of applied scientists, machine learning engineers, software engineers & product managers building the Machine Learning Software that serve as the backbone of the Zillow Offers product.
We are looking for a Machine Learning Engineer who will join the engineering group for the Automated Valuation Model team. Responsible for creating automated, explainable, and unbiased home valuations, this high impact team provides our customers with an accurate offer for their home. These automated valuations are at the core of our vision of providing consumers with an always up-to-date fair-market-value cash offer for their home.
In this
role, you will partner closely with applied scientists to realize new research breakthroughs in a robust, scalable way. You will
including data engineering pipelines, machine learning workflows, and inference microservices.
We are seeking a
who is equally versed in software engineering best practices and the latest technologies and frameworks for deploying machine learning models.
Ideally, you are interested in growing your machine learning engineering leadership, and enjoy being in a fast-paced, ambiguous environment. This role will collaborate with a team that includes applied scientists, data scientists, and a product manager. You will start remotely due to COVID-19.
Our team is excited for this
to join our mission! We have committed significant time, systems, and processes to onboard you in an inclusive and empowering way. If this message resonates with you, please apply.
This role has been categorized as a Remote position. “Remote” employees do not have a permanent corporate office workplace and, instead, work from a physical location of their choice which must be identified to the Company. Employees may live in any of the 50 US States, with limited exceptions. In certain cases, an employee in a remote-designated job may need to live in a specific region or time zone to support customers or clients as part of their role.
Who you are
Nice-to-Haves
In addition to a competitive base salary this position is also eligible for equity awards based on factors such as experience, performance and location.
Get to know us
Zillow is reimagining real estate to make it easier to unlock life’s next chapter.
As the most-visited real estate website in the United States, Zillow® and its affiliates offer customers an on-demand experience for selling, buying, renting or financing with transparency and nearly seamless end-to-end service. Millions of people visit Zillow and its affiliate sites every month to start their home search, and now they can rely on Zillow to help them finish it — and no matter what job you're in, you will play a critical role in making this vision a reality.
At Zillow, we're powered by our innovative and inclusive work culture, where everyone has the flexibility, support and resources to do the best work of their careers. Our efforts to streamline the real estate transaction is supported by our passion to redefine the employee experience, a deep-rooted culture of innovation, a fundamental commitment to Equity and Belonging, and
. But don't just take our word for it. Read our reviews on
and recent recognition from multiple organizations, including:
Bloomberg Gender-Equality Index 2021, Human Rights Campaign (HRC) Corporate Equity Index and HRC’s Best Place to Work for LGBTQ Equality 2021, Fortune Best Workplaces for Technology 2020, Fortune Best Workplaces for Millennials 2020, Fortune Best Workplaces for Parents 2020, and the Deloitte Technology Fast 500.
